alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua and south central Columbia Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near High Springs, or 10 miles southeast of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alachua, High Springs and Newberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua
